message: Let's split it evenly to avoid further devaluation.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering I'm taking the risk of further devaluation.
The devaluation hurts us both, but I'm willing to take a slight hit to end this now.  This is a better deal than you'll get in the next round.
You may think it's a good deal, but I believe I can get more, even considering the devaluation. Make a better offer or we'll both lose.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the last round where I'm willing to accept anything close to an even split.  The devaluation is quickly making this whole thing pointless.
